channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The disappearing planet next door has astronomers intrigued

item.title: Unprecedented climate shocks are changing the Great Lakes forever

item.title: Scientists stunned by colossal formations hidden under the North Sea
